text: Michael R. Long (February 1, 1940 - July 24, 2022) was an American politician. He was chairman of the Conservative Party of New York State from December 1988 to January 2019. Long represented the Borough of Brooklyn at-large on the New York City Council from 1981 to 1983. He was a Republican. Long was born in New York City. Long died on July 24, 2022 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael R. Long
